nanoidr 0.1.0.3
  • Reference

    • Random ID string generation with nanoidr

Format

Source: R/class.R
NanoID-cash-format-open-paren-close-paren.Rd

Customizable generator that you can specify your own bytes-array-creation method. You can specify any R function that recieves `size` as its argument and returns a bytes-array of wihch length is `size`.

Arguments

size

length of output.
dict

choose one of c("url", "numbers", "lowercase", "uppercase", "nolookalikes") or give acceptable strings set as character.
init.locales

vocabulary sets of words. defaut sets are c("en", "ja").
use_func

function name that will be used for generating buffer array.

Value

strings output.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
